column1: #Text=Zuko says : " Tell me where he is and I wo n't hurt you or your brother . "
#Text=Katara says : " Go jump in the river ! "
#Text=" Zuko says : " I did n't steal it , if that 's what you 're wondering .
#Text=" Pirate captain says : " Enough of this necklace garbage !
#Text=" Zuko says : " I wonder how much this is worth ... A lot , apparently .
#Text=Now you help me find what I want , you 'll get this back , and everyone goes home happy .
#Text=Search the woods for the boy and meet back here !
